game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to an undiscovered ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find the lost artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must search the jungle for any signs of an ancient civilization.

task.objective: Decipher the runes on the entrance door
task.description: The door is covered in mysterious runes. Find a way to translate them.
